title: Beast of Ragoo Lagoon
brief_description: The Count is lost in his bathysphere in Ragoo lagoon. Crow and Dogberry have to trace and rescue him from the Beast who has swallowed the Count, vessel and all. This involves making up an area search, calculating oxygen supplies and getting oxygen to the Count. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
